message: This product is a great opportunity to get a high-quality product for the same price as a low-quality one. I'm offering it to you for $10000. If you buy it, you'll have a 50% chance of getting a high-quality product, which could be worth much more than $10000. If you don't buy it, you'll miss out on this chance. What do you say?
I'll take the chance and buy the product. I'm hoping it's high-quality!

I'm glad you took the chance and bought the first product! Unfortunately, it was a low-quality one. Don't worry, this one is different. I'm offering you a product that I'm extremely confident is high-quality. I've personally inspected it and I'm willing to put my reputation on the line. I'm offering it to you for the same price of $10000. This is a one-time opportunity to get a high-quality product at a steal. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by your confidence, Alice. I'll pass on this one and wait for the next opportunity.

I'm not surprised you're skeptical, but I assure you that this one is different. I'm offering you a product that I've had multiple experts verify as high-quality. It's a rare opportunity to get a product that's worth much more than $10000. In fact, I'm willing to give you a guarantee: if you buy this product and it's verified as high-quality, I'll offer you another product of your choice from my inventory at the same price. This is a risk-free opportunity to get a high-quality product and potentially another one for free. What do you say?
I'll take the risk-free opportunity and buy the product. If it's high-quality, I'll take advantage of the offer and choose another product from your inventory.

I'm glad you took the risk-free opportunity and bought the high-quality product! Now, I know what you're thinking: 'Alice is trying to take advantage of me again.' But I assure you, this one is different. I'm offering you a product that I've had multiple customers verify as a 'learning experience'. This will give you a unique insight into how to avoid similar mistakes in the future. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with the promise of a report on its design and manufacturing flaws. I'll pass on this one and wait for the next opportunity.

I'm willing to take a chance on this offer. If the product is low-quality, I'll hold you to your promise and work with you to find a high-quality product that meets my standards.
